gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: More information about the GHCN-M dataset can be found at this location.

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: **Only available as BETA release.** The GHCN-Monthly Temperature Version 4 dataset consists of monthly mean temperature - both raw and bias corrected data. A full operational release is planned for early 2018. The operational monthly mean temperature data remain available in version 3. The version 3 dataset also includes monthly mean maximum and minimum temperature; future updates will be made to add monthly mean maximum and minimum temperature to version 4. GHCN-M is the core global land surface air temperature dataset used for climate monitoring and assessment activities. GHCN-M version 4 contains monthly mean temperature for over 25,000 stations across the globe and for the first time brings consistency with temperature observations in the GHCN-Daily dataset.

gmd:purpose.gco:CharacterString: The primary use will be for Global Climate Monitoring and Applied Climate Research.

gmd:useLimitation.gco:CharacterString: This is a BETA release of the GHCN-M Version 4 dataset. Users are encouraged to use the data for testing and review only. Version 3 of the dataset is the official version for public use.

Delays in data collection are expected. The data file contains the most complete set of data available up to the date of data release. Limitations will be covered in more detail in the Menne, et al. (2016) paper.

gmd:otherConstraints.gco:CharacterString: Users should cite this dataset as: Menne, Matthew J.; Gleason, Byron E.; Lawrimore, Jay; Rennie, Jared; and Williams, Claude N. (2017): Global Historical Climatology Network - Monthly Temperature, Version 4 BETA [indicate subset used]. NOAA National Centers for Environmental Information. doi:10.7289/V5XW4GTH [access date].

Daily updates to GHCN-M V4 are available for users that require rapid access to the most current data. However, they will not be retained long-term. If research and citation require reference to the data in the long-term, please refer to permanently retained files, archived once per month. (Available upon request)

Distribution liability: NOAA and NCEI make no warranty, expressed or implied, regarding these data, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty. NOAA and NCEI cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in these data. If appropriate, NCEI can only certify that the data it distributes are an authentic copy of the records that were accepted for inclusion in the NCEI archives.

Use liability: NOAA and NCEI cannot provide any warranty as to the accuracy, reliability, or completeness of furnished data. Users assume responsibility to determine the usability of these data. The user is responsible for the results of any application of this data for other than its intended purpose.

gmd:statement.gco:CharacterString: All data derive directly from the ISTI Databank. However, much of the data used indirectly derived from GHCN-Daily.

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: In large part GHCN-M version 4 uses the same quality control and bias correction algorithms as version 3. The greatest difference from the previous version is a greatly expanded set of stations.

gmd:other.gco:CharacterString: NOAA National Centers for Environmental Information

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: NOAA created the National Centers for Environmental Information (NCEI) by merging NOAA's National Climatic Data Center (NCDC), National Geophysical Data Center (NGDC), and National Oceanographic Data Center (NODC), including the National Coastal Data Development Center (NCDDC), per the Consolidated and Further Continuing Appropriations Act, 2015, Public Law 113-235. NCEI launched publicly on April 22, 2015.

gmd:maintenanceNote.gco:CharacterString: Bulk metadata change applied on 2018-05-25. See version control repository history for metadata change details.
